channel.title: I'm sorry everyone
channel.description: In light of my short leave and return about a week ago. I feel i have set of a chain reaction. First me, then Mr.Chris, now leader and cowie and a few others. I feel i have set this off, even though Chris has a very valid reason, i feel i have just pushed these people the extra mile towards leaving. So i apologise to everyone of the moparisthebest community, if i have lost you any good friends the past week or so. As i have said before, i'm back for.. well good now. But i'm only going to be putting all my time and effort into Graphics board down at the bottom. :) Once again sorry.

item.title: I'm sorry everyone
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“bigmac, post:1, topic:18448”]In light of my short leave and return about a week ago. I feel i have set of a chain reaction. First me, then Mr.Chris, now leader and cowie and a few others.
I feel i have set this off, even though Chris has a very valid reason, i feel i have just pushed these people the extra mile towards leaving.
So i apologise to everyone of the moparisthebest community, if i have lost you any good friends the past week or so.
As i have said before, i’m back for… well good now. But i’m only going to be putting all my time and effort into Graphics board down at the bottom.
Once again sorry.[/quote]

I have been thinking about leaving for a long time. There isn’t any reason that you should be sorry. It isn’t your fault that people are leaving. The main reason I was deciding to leave was because I have too much stress and things on my mind, and have sleeping problems. For some reason I automatically wake up 3-5 hours after I go to bed and then can’t go back to sleep.

I never get anything done because I always have something else that I have to do first. Example yesterday I had to go play tennis with my dad, and now I have to do so much homework today. I felt like dropping out of school because I stay up doing homework until 12-2 am. I don’t get to spend time with friends or family and get in trouble everyday.

It is good that you’re going to stay and be active on this forum. I’m glad you passed your test. Mr. Chris is staying on this forum too, isn’t he? Well, I will talk to you sometime on msn.

Your friend,
Leader

Read full topic
